content.text: The code repository located at /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/uri-differ is currently written in Java 8. Please migrate the entire codebase to Java 17.

reasoningText.text:
I need to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. Let me start by exploring the repository structure to understand what we're working with.

1. First, I'll view the directory structure
2. Look at the pom.xml (if it's a Maven project) or build.gradle (if it's a Gradle project)
3. Identify any Java 8 specific configurations
4. Update the configuration to Java 17
5. Check for any code that needs to be updated
6. Run `mvn clean verify` to ensure everything works

Let's start!

Content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.sonatype.oss</groupId>
        <artifactId>oss-parent</artifactId>
        <version>9</version>
    </parent>

    <groupId>ru.lanwen.diff</groupId>
    <artifactId>uri-differ-lib</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.1-SNAPSHOT</version>

    <packaging>jar</packaging>


    <name>URI Differ Library</name>
    <description>Simple lib to find diffs in two URIs with ability to pretty print result</description>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
    </properties>

    <scm>
        <url>git@github.com:yandex-qatools/uri-differ.git</url>
        <connection>scm:git:git@github.com:yandex-qatools/uri-differ.git</connection>
        <developerConnection>scm:git:git@github.com:yandex-qatools/uri-differ.git</developerConnection>
    </scm>


    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>The MIT License (MIT)</name>
            <url>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lanwen/uri-differ/master/LICENSE</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <developers>
        <developer>
            <id>lanwen</id>
            <name>Merkushev Kirill</name>
            <roles>
                <role>Developer</role>
            </roles>
        </developer>
    </developers>


    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>javax.inject</groupId>
            <artifactId>javax.inject</artifactId>
            <version>1</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.glassfish.jersey.core</groupId>
            <artifactId>jersey-common</artifactId>
            <exclusions>
                <exclusion>
                    <artifactId>javax.inject</artifactId>
                    <groupId>org.glassfish.hk2.external</groupId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>
                    <artifactId>osgi-resource-locator</artifactId>
                    <groupId>org.glassfish.hk2</groupId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>
                    <artifactId>javax.annotation-api</artifactId>
                    <groupId>javax.annotation</groupId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>
                    <artifactId>javassist</artifactId>
                    <groupId>org.javassist</groupId>
                </exclusion>
                <exclusion>
                    <artifactId>aopalliance-repackaged</artifactId>
                    <groupId>org.glassfish.hk2.external</groupId>
                </exclusion>
            </exclusions>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.googlecode.java-diff-utils</groupId>
            <artifactId>diffutils</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
            <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <!--test-->
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.hamcrest</groupId>
            <artifactId>hamcrest-all</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <!--/test-->

    </dependencies>


    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.hamcrest</groupId>
                <artifactId>hamcrest-all</artifactId>
                <version>1.3</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.glassfish.jersey.core</groupId>
                <artifactId>jersey-common</artifactId>
                <version>2.25</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.googlecode.java-diff-utils</groupId>
                <artifactId>diffutils</artifactId>
                <version>1.3.0</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.apache.commons</groupId>
                <artifactId>commons-lang3</artifactId>
                <version>3.5</version>
            </dependency>

            <!--test-->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>junit</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
                <version>4.12</version>
                <scope>test</scope>
            </dependency>
            <!--/test-->

        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.3</version>
                <inherited>true</inherited>
                <configuration>
                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                    <encoding>utf-8</encoding>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
                <artifactId>cobertura-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.7</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>clean</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

    <reporting>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId>
                <artifactId>cobertura-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.7</version>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </reporting>

</project>

Good! Java 17 is already installed. Now let me update the pom.xml to use Java 17 instead of Java 8:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/uri-differ/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:     <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
    </properties>
New string:     <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
    </properties>
Now let me update the maven-compiler-plugin configuration to use Java 17:

Text replacement complete and details displayed in console.
File: /tmp/workdir/baseline_strands_min_20260129/uri-differ/pom.xml
Replaced 1 occurrence
Old string:             <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.3</version>
                <inherited>true</inherited>

                    <source>1.8</source>
                    <target>1.8</target>
                    <encoding>utf-8</encoding>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
New string:             <plugin>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.11.0</version>
                <inherited>true</inherited>
                <configuration>
                    <source>17</source>
                    <target>17</target>
                    <encoding>utf-8</encoding>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
Now let me update the Jersey version to ensure it's compatible with Java 17. Jersey 2.25 is quite old and may have issues with Java 17. Let me update it to a newer version:

            </dependency>
New string:             <dependency>
                <groupId>org.glassfish.jersey.core</groupId>
                <artifactId>jersey-common</artifactId>
                <version>2.41</version>
            </dependency>

The issue is with the cobertura-maven-plugin which is not compatible with Java 17 (it tries to find tools.jar which was removed in Java 9+). Let's remove this plugin as it's just for code coverage reporting:

Perfect! The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The `mvn clean verify` command passes with all 83 tests running successfully.

## Summary of Changes Made:

1. **Updated Maven Compiler Configuration:**
   - Updated `maven.compiler.source` and `maven.compiler.target` properties from `1.8` to `17`
   - Updated `maven-compiler-plugin` version from `3.3` to `3.11.0`
   - Updated `source` and `target` in the compiler plugin configuration from `1.8` to `17`

2. **Updated Dependencies:**
   - Updated Jersey from version `2.25` to `2.41` for Java 17 compatibility

3. **Removed Incompatible Plugins:**
   - Removed `cobertura-maven-plugin` which is not compatible with Java 17 (it depends on `tools.jar` which was removed in Java 9+)

4. **Code Refactoring:**
   - Replaced Jersey's repackaged Guava `Joiner.on()` with standard Java `String.join()` in 5 files:
     - `DeltaFormatter.java`
     - `SchemeFilter.java`
     - `Change.java`
     - `UriDiff.java`
     - `AnyParamValueFilter.java`
   
   This was necessary because newer versions of Jersey no longer repackage Guava classes, and using standard Java methods is more appropriate for Java 17.

All tests pass successfully, and the project now compiles and runs on Java 17!
